Module ChessTournament
Package ntnu.idatt2001.k2g9.file

Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2001.k2g9.file.FileHandler
public class FileHandler extends Object
Class used for handling JSON file Tournament registry. Class has a default path, which refers to the Tournaments.json file. This file is the main file in the Project used for storing information.
